Claim: "Three girls are standing and talking to each other."
Referring expressions: Three girls, each other.  Three girls
Formula: (exists a (IsStanding(a) and AreTalkingToEachOther(a)) & (forall c (  AreTalkingToEachOther(c) ->  IsTalking(c))) & (forall d ( IsTalking(d) ->   AreTalkingToEachOther(d)))) -> (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsTalking(a) and (IsTalking(b) and IsTalking(c))))))
